'''Anniq''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|An elderly dwarf folds her arms, her disapproving frown warping the tattoos that encircle her face.}}

Anniq is the tattooed chieftain of the Junvik village to the far north of Deadfire. Unlike Tatok, she is a fervent believer in [Nemnok](/nemnokTheDevourer/) and treats him like an actual god.

## Interactions

|none            = 
|other           = The Watcher engages Anniq and [Tatok](/tatok/) in dialogue upon first entering the area.
}}
